person_say: I didn't do well on my exam, and it's making me feel really discouraged. How can I regain my confidence?
animal_say: There's a wonderful bear named Bruno who specializes in mindfulness! Would you like to meet him to help boost your confidence and ease that discouragement?

person_say: Yes, meeting Bruno sounds wonderful! I would love to learn from him to help boost my confidence and ease my discouragement.
animal_say: Awesome! Here comes Bruno, the mindfulness master! He'll help you find your inner strength and confidence in no time!
